name: aMaz3D
blurb: A 3D maze exploration game in which the player must navigate a twisty maze with forward, backward, left, right, up, and down movements.

rewards.reward: 1. 100 ducats (currency)\r\n\r\n2. Your name will be added to the list of backers on the game website. Names will be sorted by pledge amount and sub-sorted alphabetically.

1. 7500 ducats (currency)
  
2. Your name will be added to the list of backers on the game website. Names will be sorted by pledge amount and sub-sorted alphabetically.

3. Your name will be added to the in-game credits screen sorted as above.

1. 7500 ducats (currency) 

2. Your name will be added to the list of backers on the game website. Names will be sorted by pledge amount and sub-sorted alphabetically. 

3. Your name will be added to a 3D plaque model on the wall of the in-game credits scene sorted as above. 

4. Access to beta releases of the games. 

5. A keychain bearing the company logo, handmade by the creator of the game.

N.B. The new rewards also apply to backers that previously pledged in this range.

1. 20000 ducats (currency)
   
2. Your name will be added to the list of backers on the game website. Names will be sorted by pledge amount and sub-sorted alphabetically.

3. Your name will be added to the in-game credits screen sorted as above.

4. Access to a private youtube channel.

5. A keychain bearing the company logo, handmade by the creator of the game.

1. 20000 ducats (currency) 

2. Your name will be added to the list of backers on the game website. Names will be sorted by pledge amount and sub-sorted alphabetically. 

3. Your picture will be added to a 3D picture frame that has a plaque with your name attached to it. This frame and plaque will hang on the wall of the in-game credits scene sorted as above. 

4. Access to beta releases of the game 

5. Access to a private youtube channel.  The channel will have a mix of content such as developer diaries, screencasts of things that failed, videos of me making sounds and do voices, candid discussion, and rants when things don't go according to plan.  I will also video me making the keychains and any other hand made rewards.

6. A keychain bearing the company logo, handmade by the creator of the game.

N.B. The new rewards also apply to backers that previously pledged in this range

1. 60000 ducats (currency)
   
2. Your name will be added to the list of backers on the game website. Names will be sorted by pledge amount and sub-sorted alphabetically.

3. Your picture will be added to a 3D picture frame that has a plaque with your name attached to it. This frame and plaque will hang on the wall of the in-game credits scene sorted as above.

5. Access to a private youtube channel.  The channel will have a mix of content such as developer diaries, screencasts of things that failed, videos of me making sounds and doing voices, candid discussion, and rants when things don't go according to plan.  I will also video me making the keychains and any other hand made rewards.

6. A keychain bearing the company logo, handmade by the creator of the game.

7. The picture/plaque described in item 3 will be placed in a maze level.  Names will be chosen at random and placed along the solution path where they are sure to be seen.
